Extracted Variables:
- Let \( x_1 \) be the number of crepe cakes
- Let \( x_2 \) be the number of sponge cakes
- Let \( x_3 \) be the number of birthday cakes

Extracted Constraints:
- \( 400x_1 + 500x_2 + 450x_3 \leq 20000 \) (batter constraint)
- \( 200x_1 + 300x_2 + 350x_3 \leq 14000 \) (milk constraint)
- \( x_1, x_2, x_3 \geq 0 \) (non-negativity constraint)

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize \( 12x_1 + 10x_2 + 15x_3 \) (profit objective)
